tasks.title: Task 1: Design Database Schema
tasks.description: Design the schema for the task management database.

tasks.title: Task 2: Set Up Development Environment
tasks.description: Set up the development environment for the project.

tasks.title: Task 3: Create API Endpoints
tasks.description: Create RESTful API endpoints for managing tasks.

tasks.title: Task 4: Implement User Authentication
tasks.description: Implement user authentication using JWT for secure login.

tasks.title: Task 5: Set Up Frontend Project
tasks.description: Set up the React project for the frontend of the task management application.

tasks.title: Task 6: Implement Task List Feature
tasks.description: Implement the feature to display the task list on the dashboard.

tasks.title: Task 7: Implement Drag and Drop Functionality
tasks.description: Implement drag-and-drop functionality for task management.

tasks.title: Task 8: Integrate API with Frontend
tasks.description: Integrate the backend API with the React frontend for task management.

tasks.title: Task 9: Set Up Database Connection
tasks.description: Set up the database connection and configure it for the project.

tasks.title: Task 10: Create User Model
tasks.description: Create the user model and schema for the backend.

tasks.title: Task 11: Write Unit Tests for API
tasks.description: Write unit tests for the task management API endpoints.

tasks.title: Task 12: Deploy Backend to Server
tasks.description: Deploy the backend API to a production server for testing.
